SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBookUI
User interface for adding a new book to the system.
AddCDUI
User interface class responsible for adding a new CD to the system.
AdminMenuUI
Provides the administrator interface for managing the library system.
AdminService
Service class for handling admin login and logout functionality.
Book
Represents a book in the library system.
BookInventory
Singleton class that manages book inventory and notifies observers when a book is returned.
BookObserver
Observer interface for receiving notifications when a book becomes available.
BookSearchContext
Context class for executing book search using a chosen strategy.
BookSearchStrategy
Strategy interface for searching books.
BookService
Service class for searching books using different strategies.
BookServiceAdmin
Admin service for managing books, CDs, and user accounts.
BookServiceCustomer
Service class for managing customer operations related to borrowing, returning, and viewing loans for books and CDs.
CD
Represents a CD in the library system.
CD_Test
 
CustomerMenuUI
User interface for the customer menu in the library system.
CustomerObserver
CustomerObserver listens for notifications when a media item (book or other) becomes available.
Doenev
Doenev is a small utility class responsible for loading email credentials from a .env file using the Dotenv library.
EmailService
EmailService provides asynchronous and synchronous support for sending emails using SMTP.
FileBookRepository
Repository class for managing Books stored in a file.
FileCDRepository
Repository class for managing CDs stored in a file.
FileLoanRepository
Repository class for managing loans stored in a file.
FileMediaCopyRepository
Repository class for managing media copies (books, CDs) stored in a file.
FileUserRepository
Repository class for managing users stored in a file.
HelloApplication
Main entry point for the library application.
InputValidator
Utility class for validating user input from the console.
LibrarianMenuUI
User interface for the librarian menu in the library system.
LibrarianService
Service class for librarians to manage and query loans.
LibrarianServiceTest
 
Loan
Represents a loan transaction in the library system.
LoginUI
User interface class responsible for handling user login.
MediaCopy
Represents a physical copy of a media item in the library system.
MediaCopyTest
 
MediaItem
Represents a generic media item in the library system.
MediaItemTest
 
ReminderService
ReminderService handles detection of overdue loans and sends reminder emails to users who have overdue items.
SearchBookUI
User interface class for searching books in the library system.
SearchByAuthorStrategy
Searches for books by author name.
SearchByISBNStrategy
Searches for books by their ISBN.
SearchByTitleStrategy
Implements the BookSearchStrategy interface to search for books by their title.
SignUp
User interface class for signing up new users in the library system.
User
Represents a user in the library system.
